name: 77 Oleander Avenue Ghost House Investigation
description:
77 Oleander Avenue is a Visual Novel developed for the 2021 Trans Game Dev Birthday Jam. Music, Coding, and Writing by Runa Liore Winters. Attributions for images and sounds available in the game directory.

This version only contains 1 of the 3 routes planned for the game at present, but the remaining routes will be added with a future update.

Controls

Left Click/Spacebar/Enter - Confirm/Advance Dialogue

Page up/Mouse scrollwheel Up - Returns to previous dialogue/action

Page down/Mouse scrollwheel Down - Advances to next dialogue/action (Stops at unread text)

Esc/Right Click - Open Menu

Ctrl - Skips dialogue/actions

H - Hides User Interface

S - Screenshot
